attributes.additional_details:
"cannabinoids have benefit in relief of pain... and relief of nausea and vomiting." - http://www.webmd.com/fibromyalgia/guide/fibromyalgia-and-medical-marijuana

"Cannabis has been shown to kill cancer cells in the laboratory" - http://www.cancer.gov/about-cancer/treatment/cam/patient/cannabis-pdq

"dealers are lacing skunk weed with heroin" - http://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/news/liverpool-news/hooked-now-mersey-drug-dealers-6735907
attributes.background: Cannabis should be legalised for both medical and recreational uses, a lot of people suffer from chronic pain and cannabis is a good pain killer for them. You hear a lot of stories of cannabis being cut with hard drugs, legalising it will stop this problem as people can buy it from a reliable source

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104349

The petition above has achieved 100,000 signatures and has been selected by the Petitions Committee for debate in Westminster Hall on Monday 12 October.
